mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_table(create_time, client_id, order_sale_price, order_purchase_price, state, wholesale_order) VALUES(#{create_id}, #{client_id}, #{order_sale_price}, #{order_purchase_price}, #{state}, #{wholesale_order})
INSERT INTO order_prod_table(order_id, product_id, count) VALUES(#{order_id}, #{product_id}, #{count})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.create_time, o.client_id, c.client_name, p.product_id. p.count FROM order_table o, order_prod_table p, client_table c WHERE o.state = "draft" AND o.order_id = p.order_id AND o.client_id = c.client_id
mapper.delete: DELETE order_table,order_prod_table FROM order_table AS o1 LEFT JOIN order_prod_table AS o2 on o1.order_id = o2.order_id WHERE order_table.state = "draft"
